title: Old diaries, 1881-1901 /
author: Gower, Ronald Sutherland
snippet: Just before we returned to the mainland a violent storm of rain came on ; but my recollections of the Bass will be of sunshine and calm seas, and flights of gulls, looking like snowflakes, across the blue sky. Another day I was taken to Gosford House, Lord Wemyss'. I was disappointed with the interior of the house, of which one had heard so much.
